title: [Question]How to crack coding rounds
content:
I gave the flipkart and intuit coding exam and found out that my ass couldn't even solve a single question. Leave the solving part my autistic brain couldn't even understand what's the actual question is .I am solving leetcode (beginner level) but I found that the questions in coding rounds is far complicated than the leetcode.
So if I want to crack atleast the coding what should I do how do I train myself to do it.

comments.body:
Short answer: practice, practice and more practice. Its something you will get better only by solving more problems.   
Long answer: Scroll back, someone had posted various resources for OA prep.

If you're targeting big tech big packages then start doing f*ck lot of DSA matter of fact Competitive Programming also. Been giving OAs this week and it's all LC Hard and above stuff baring 1 or at max 2 questions üôèüôèü•≤
Keep practicing from LeetCode, give contests, also do CodeForces, hard grind DSA, then u can clear coding rounds.
